channel.title: Upcoming project [serious applicants only please]
channel.description:
Hello everybody,
I don't really want to write out an entire essay in this thread, because it's more than likely that half of you won't even read all of it, so I'll keep it short and simple.
I am planning on starting up a new project for a 317 RSPS, and I'm currently looking for 2 Server developers and 1 Client developer (both positions will be paid positions) . I am willing to spend the time and money on this project in order to ensure success in this project, however I do require the full support & effort of the potential development team.
I've purposefully not included any further details about the 317 project because there hasn't been much specification on it yet. This server is going to strive to be unique, so there is no single objective in what we want the final outcome to be.
If you would like a proper, long and intellectual conversation about this project, or even have a general interest then add me on Skype: owner.vyres
- Thanks
Kind Regards, Unlike Me
~ P.S. Sorry for any potential spelling/grammar mistakes, was kind of in a rush to write out this thread.

item.title: Upcoming project [serious applicants only please]
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“sini, post:16, topic:554641”][quote author=Tree link=topic=673566.msg4504211#msg4504211 date=1455238512]

Estimated pay?

That depends entirely on the success of the server. If you want to discuss it further you have my Skype.

So nothing?
[/quote]

Blank checks[/quote]
My favorite.

Read full topic

item.title: Upcoming project [serious applicants only please]
item.dc:creator: @uncalled_for uncalled for
item.description:
@uncalled_for wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:13, topic:554641”][quote author=uncalled for link=topic=673566.msg4504183#msg4504183 date=1455207091]

Anyone who’s Skype handle is “Owner.Vyres” doesn’t really scream a serious project or professionalism. You should probably change that.

Really? So “owner” referring to a “owner” status/rank and the “Vyres” referring to the in-game name I use is not professional? The Skype was literally created for the purpose of a RSPS I used to own. It makes complete sense, and is beyond professional. You clearly are either ignorant, or lack knowledge in the whole ‘professionalism’ field.

Yeah I must have lack of knowledge in the professionalism field. That’s it.

Alright, thank you for clearing that up for me.
[/quote]

No Problem. Good Luck OWNER Uncalled For. I Hope Your Project Goes Far :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :P[/quote]

Thank you sweetie pie.

Read full topic
